events.name: Manchester City at West Ham United

headlines.description: Gabriel Jesus became the first player in Premier League history to have a goal ruled out by VAR in Man City's 5-0 win over West Ham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sterling hits 3 in City win as VAR takes centre stage

headlines.description: Talismanic Sheffield United striker Billy Sharp came off the bench to give his side a share of the spoils in a 1-1 draw at Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sharp goal earns Sheff Utd point at Bournemouth

headlines.description: Ashley Barnes struck twice as Burnley beat Southampton 3-0 at a wet and windswept Turf Moor on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Barnes strikes twice as Clarets sink sorry Saints

headlines.description: Everton missed a string of chances to start their Premier League campaign on a winning note after they were held 0-0 at Crystal Palace on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace hold dominant 10-man Everton to 0-0 dra

headlines.description: An own goal by Watford's Abdoulaye Doucoure and second-half strikes by Florin Andone and Neal Maupay gave Brighton a 3-0 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Andone, Maupay strike as Brighton stun Watford

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur scored twice late in the game to come from behind and beat Aston Villa 3-1 in their Premier League opener.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kane strikes late double as Tottenham beat Villa
